fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Hide**(Day) Watch the town from the shadows. You don't get to vote and you cannot be voted
**Kill** (Night) Attack another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
*Attack* goes up 1 stage every two player deaths (None --> Basic --> Powerful --> Unstoppable).*
Once *Attack* has maxed out, *Defense* begins to increase in the same way.
If *Attack* and *Defense* are maxed, you will *Rampage*.
You are *roleblock immune*.
*Goal*: Eliminate the rest of the factions~
